Articles.Content:
Ok, first off i have to thank everyone for trying to give me helpful information on how to model an object for this game..

I have learned much but i have thus far run into the following problems:

1) I tried running the 'Get Vector Tool' script that comes with the KSP SDK, and it will not execute...

2) When i export my beloved box, it gives me the following error.

3) I am running FBX Version 2012.1 and from what i notice, there is a wee bit of a difference from the one mention in the tutorial done by C7.

VERSION 2012.0

VERSION 2012.1

So, where is it that i have gone wrong? I promise i will build a small shrine to the person that can answer these questions and feed them large portions of Mars Bars! PROMISE!! ;D
Im busy till about 7:30 est, if you\'re online around then, I can walk you through the whole process. Do you have Skype or anything?
I will PM that info to you.
